testcase.classname: Create the New IPO from Pending IPO list
testcase.name: Create New IPO in Pending IPO List
testcase.system-out: Given Login with Audit Manager credentials in Login page....................passed Then Click on WovenKnit Module..............................................passed And Click on Audit Module...................................................passed Then Click on Pending IPO list in menu......................................passed And Verify whether user navigated to Pending IPO list or not................passed And Verify whether the data is displaying in grid or not....................passed And Click on Generate IPO button............................................passed And Verify whether Generate IPO screen is displaying or not.................passed And Verify whether the current date is displaying for IPO date field or not.passed And verify whether the Buyer Style is prepopulated or not...................passed And Verify whether the IPO field is prepopulated with data or not...........passed And Enter IPO number in IPO field...........................................passed And Verify Buyer is prepopulated or not.....................................passed
